overview:
Julian Terry is a founder of Drobo Corporation and is one of the principal architects for its core technology.

Prior to Drobo, Julian was Head of Research at Phoenix Corporation and managed all engineering development and support for Europe, Middle East and Africa. Julian was Head of Engineering at DIP, where he was responsible for the design of the world’s first handheld PC compatible computer. Julian earned his honors degree in Computer Systems Engineering from the University of Bristol, UK.
